name: Aqua Vitae
description:
Aqua vitae (Latin for "water of life") or aqua vita is an archaic name for a concentrated aqueous solution of ethanol. 

You play as a citizen of the USSR, whose grandfather left a recipe for "water of life".

**Control:**

WASD: Movement
Mouse: Look around
Left click: Pickup/Interact with objects
CTRL: Crouch
Tab: Help
ESC: Menu/Settings

All content (except radio broadcast) was made in 72 hours by Roman Zimenko, Yuriy Mikhalchenko and Maxim Golubenko.

Broadcast used: “At a party”, July 8, 1980. All rights to the songs belong to their respective owners.

Changelog:

1.0. Release build

1.1. Few critical bug fixes:

- Sometimes (almost everytime) items can be droped trough wall/floor

- Mouse sensitivity bug

- Linux and Mac Support (still need to be tested)
